Hatchets were tools sometimes used by rangers or woodsmen throughout Faer√ªn.
A hatchet resembled a small axe with a blade on one side of the metal head and a flattened stub on the other. A typical hatchet weighed .
Hatchets were versatile tools used for chopping and hammering wood. They could also be used as weapons.
Hatchets were available for purchase through Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue for 2 gold pieces and included a leather case.
